name: EDGE THE GAME
description:
This game is still in the Early Acess, Early Development, and Beta versions. Please feel free to Comment with your opinion or Your Feedback to make the game more fun and better!

(The game Develop in just 3 days, and will continue Developing so the game will be updated with User-Feedback)

This game is a 2D shooter game and your point is to get the highest scores, Upgrade your weapons and stats, Buy some useful Gadgets, and More!

______________________________________________________________________________

COOLS THINGS YOU CAN HELP ME OUT (Comments below if you have a cool ideas)

  • cool Gadgets (what can be a cool fun gadget?)
  • art style
  • enemy type
  • etc.
